entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
